nodes.text: The Battle Droid BX was a model of humanoid-shaped battle droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. A number of them were used to defend the exterior of the factory during the Cold War.
Battle Droid BXs appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found around the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
